EmailTemplate.subject: New blog! How do NCR design for today’s consumer
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We all know today’s consumers expect more. They want to see the technologies they use daily reflected across multiple touchpoints, whether that’s at a fast-food restaurant, airport or your financial institution. Designing for today’s consumer is a complex process. One must consider advances in today’s consumer technology, like facial recognition, pinch-and-zoom and contactless, plus global accessibility standards to ensure a product all users can enjoy. And then there’s designing for durability, sustainability and longevity. All these considerations need to come together when building new technologies.
